publications.title: HybEx-Law: A Hybrid Neural-Symbolic System for Legal Aid Eligibility Determination
publications.abstract: A system blending neural models with rule-based reasoning to determine legal aid eligibility, achieving F1-score of 0.985.

publications.title: High-Precision Polygonal Parking Slot Detection via SwinMask2Former and Dynamic Gap Analysis
publications.abstract: Novel end-to-end framework for layout-free parking vacancy detection achieving mAP50 of 98.99%.

publications.title: Advancing Human Activity Recognition: A Comparative Analysis of Graph Convolutional Networks and Masked Autoencoders
publications.abstract: Comparative study achieving 99.99% accuracy with HAR-GCNN on PAMAP2 dataset.

publications.title: Nexus: A Three-Pronged Agentic AI System for Intelligent Research and Analysis
publications.abstract: Multi-agent system for automated research discovery and synthesis using LangGraph.
